name: Titanium.UI.iOS.AttributedString
summary: An attributed string proxy manages character strings and associated sets of attributes (for example, font and kerning) that apply to individual characters or ranges of characters in the string.

methods.name: addAttribute
methods.summary: Adds an Attribute with the given name and value to the characters in the specified range.

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: Internally, this calls the addAttribute method for each of the attributes passed in.

properties.name: text
properties.summary: The text applied to the attributed string.
properties.description: The text property must be set in the constructor and cannot be changed.
